doc:
Clegg Hoyt https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Clegg_Hoyt 0 Clegg Hoyt (December 10, 1910 – October 6, 1967) was an American film and television character actor, originally from Norwalk, Connecticut. Hoyt's acting career lasted eleven years and he appeared in many Westerns, as well as in sitcoms, and dramas. Clegg_Hoyt ( December_10_,_1910 – October_6_,_1967 ) was an_American_film_and_television_character_actor , originally from Norwalk , Connecticut .
